title: Photoshop Down & Dirty Tricks for Designers
description:
Photoshop Down & Dirty Tricks for Designers By Corey Barker
Publisher: New Rid,.,ers Press 2011 | 384 Pages | ISBN: 0321820495 | PDF | 57 MB
